title: The hye way to the spyttell hous Copland and the porter. Who so hath lust, or wyll leaue his thryft ...
author: Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.
publisher: In the Fletestrete at ye Rose garland, by Robert Copland,
notes: The author's name, Robert Copland, appears in full on A1v.
An adaptation of: Balsac, Robert de.  Le chemin de l'ospital.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
